#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

double polygonArea(vector<long long> X,vector<long long> Y, long long numPoints) 
{ 
  long long area = 0;         // Accumulates area in the loop
  long long j = numPoints-1;  // The last vertex is the 'previous' one to the first
  long long i;
  for (i=0; i<numPoints; i++)
    { area = area +  (X[j]+X[i]) * (Y[j]-Y[i]); 
      j = i;  
    }
			X.clear();
			Y.clear();
  return (double)area/2;
}
int main() {
	int T;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	vector<long long>v;
	while(T-->0)
	{
		v.clear();
		vector<long long>x,y;
		long long xi,yi;
		long long n,m,i,j;
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		for( i = 0 ; i < n ; i++ )
		{
		cin>>xi;
		x.push_back(xi);
		}
	    for( i = 0 ; i < n ; i++ )
		{
		cin>>yi;
		y.push_back(yi);
		}
		double answer = (double) polygonArea (x,y,n);
		if(answer<0)
		answer*=-1;
		printf("%.1f\n",answer);
		x.clear();
		y.clear(); 
	//  v.push_back(answer);
		}
	return 0;
}
